casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Daryl JONES 336A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 5, 2018 James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Jones, Daryl Lamont. Glenn G. Gerding, Appellate Defender. Carole Biggers, Assistant Attorney General, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of January 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of January 2018."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 9th day of February 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
